item.title: Top 10 HTML Beginner Resources
item.description: Beginning with HTML Over the past few weeks I’ve noticed a few people have been asking me if I had any tips for the best HTML beginner resources. This is something that comes up for myself once in while when needing some bit of HTML reference that I have forgotten through under-use. In order to kill two (three?) birds with one stone I thought I would make a list for myself–in the form of a post–that I could share with those people.
